name: Angel of Nothingness
description: Inherits **12%** of the Wanderer's flame, ice, volt and physical ATK. Angel of Nothingness has **1** module spot and **5** skill points.
advancements: Increase attack inheritance to **18%**, increase Flame Jet damage to **118%** of ATK per flow, Angel of Nothingness now has **2** module spots and **8** skill points.
Increase attack inheritance to **24%**, increase Angel's Wrath damage to **901%**, Angel of Nothingness now has **3** module spots and **11** skill points.
Increase attack inheritance to **30%**, increase Flame Bomb damage to **619%**, Angel of Nothingness now has **4** module spots and **15** skill points.

abilities.name: Flame Bomb
abilities.effect: The Angel of Nothingness raises his right arm and fires 4 flame bombs at the enemy, each flame bomb that hits the enemy deals damage equal to **413%** of ATK.

abilities.name: Flame Jet
abilities.effect: The Angel of Nothingness sprays out 4 flame flows to the enemy in  front, each flow deals **78%** of ATK, and applies a burning effect with **60%** of ATK, hold..

abilities.name: Angel's Wrath
abilities.effect: The Angel of Nothingness raises his hands high, accumumating power above his head. Create a fireball, then throw the fireball at the enemy in front, dealing damage equal to **600%** of ATK to hit enemies.
